EmailTemplate.name: Product Delivered - Social Post_Find me on FSP_TEAM
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Five Star Professional premium digital profile social post has been published!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c}:
A new social post has been published for you! Please check out your new post online and share it directly to your network to optimize the views and interactions.
Your post can be viewed here: {!Fulfillment__c.Product_Delivered_Link__c}
Additionally, we encourage you to share the following announcement email with your clients and network. Just copy/paste the content below into an email or other digital announcement platform to share.
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to your Client Success Representative, {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Fullname__c}, at {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Phone__c} or by email at {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Email__c}.
Thank you, Five Star Professional Client Success Team
__________________________________________
As {!Fulfillment__c.Market_Award_Year__c} Five Star Professional award winners in the {!Fulfillment__c.Market_Region__c} area, {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Team_Name__c} stand out from the competition! As {!Fulfillment__c.Market_Award_Year__c} winners, {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Team_Name__c} have been recognized for providing excellent customer service.
Check out {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Team_Name__c} here! Copy/paste the following url to visit their professional profile page on FiveStarProfessional.com.
{!Fulfillment__c.Product_Delivered_Link__c}
Share their contact information and success story with your friends and connections who are in search of outstanding professionals.
Five Star winners excel in providing excellent services to their clients, and this is just one more point of contact they have to make it easy to get in touch.
Congratulations once again to {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Team_Name__c}!
Jonathan Wesser Five Star Professional VP, Research
